title: (x) Lighthouse Lights - FF Signa Extd {Nicolai}

comments.content: Some extended weight of FF Signa
To be exact it is [FF Signa Extended Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000829/http:/www.fontfont.com/shop/index.ep?cview=P71971S&clist=PS)
